Rule 1: NO Short chapters. I can not tell you how many times ill be reading a good stories and ill get a chapter with like 1 sentence that doesnt lead into other choices or anything so please make chapters decently lengthed

Rule 2: No gay stuff. I just dont like it it's as simple as that

Rule 3: Try not to kill off the character too early, but remember that even though they're video game characters they can't survive everything

other then that go crazy i guess
